description: Access to the structure is initially given only to those who helped fight coronavirus in the city.
title: Coronavirus: Barcelona's Sagrada Familia basilica reopens to key workers
title_page: Coronavirus: Barcelona's Sagrada Familia basilica reopens to key workers - BBC News
maintext: One of Spain's most famous landmarks, the Sagrada Familia basilica in Barcelona, has reopened its doors to visitors for the first time since it was shut in March because of the coronavirus pandemic.
